Reviews.Title: Good price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a good adapter ring, it does the job it was made for. No problem with the quality.  It is a good way to be able to use your Cokin filters with different cameras.

Reviews.Title: fits my digital fugi cam
Reviews.Author: Mr KK "Mr KK"
Reviews.Content: I hade an (A) setup and did not know we needed adaptor  to use the (p) ring or that there were (a) adapeters

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Clio
Reviews.Content: I was apprehensive about buying a generic product for my camera, but thought at the price I should give it a try. I'm glad I did. It fits my T3i perfectly and works well with my Cokin lens holder.
